translations: n.演剧活动；演剧技术；业余演戏；戏剧性行为

phrs.translation: 戏剧, 靛扼付平胶, 演剧活动
创作性戏剧活动, 创作性戏剧术, 创作性戏剧
华北区业余话剧舞台艺术片, 竞赛中的故事

sentences.sentence: Angela says she longs to join an amateur dramatics class.
sentences.translation: 安吉拉说她渴望参加业余戏剧班。

sentences.sentence: We don't need your dramatics here.
sentences.translation: 我们不需要你在这里演戏。

sentences.sentence: His friends were tired of all his phony dramatics.
sentences.translation: 他的朋友厌烦了他虚伪的做作。
